resources.string: Activate the service to use the scheduling mode (gear) auto-switch
This service is required to adjust performance according to application, automatically switch GPS, and record power consumption speed
View the power consumption(electricity) recorded during application use
Charge should be shown as positive,\ndischarge should be shown as negative
No supported configuration file was found
Start to reclaim a little memory (long press to reclaim more ~)
The ROOT permission is not obtained

The statistics here are only the power consumption of the whole machine when each application is displayed in the foreground, while the current and temperature show the average of all detection records.This means that this value is affected by the power consumption of other background applications!\n\n This data is collected by the auxiliary service of Scene. If you have kept the Scene mode running in the background for a period of time but haven\'t got the data, please check whether the current display on the overview interface is correct. If not, please manually calibrate the current unit.
Check and obtain the required permissions……

Scene Core Edition is an application that focuses on performance scheduling.It does not modify any system files, so it is safe in most cases.To undo all the changes, simply close or uninstall the software and restart the phone.\n\n However, it should be noted that according to previous user feedback, using this software on some models of Meizu, LG, Google Pixel will force restoration to factory Settings, resulting in data loss!!
I understand and am willing to take risks
Please grant Scene [Display pop-up window] permission first

Wait timeout, make sure your Root manager is running, and try again!

 Make sure you don't prevent "authorization Manager (SuperSu, Magisk Manager, etc.)" from starting and allow background pop-ups, display hover Windows, etc.If no authorization dialog box is displayed, restart the phone and try again.
Sorry, the ROOT permission is not granted
Without ROOT, you lose many features.\n If you miss the authorization prompt, or do not see the popup, go to your ROOT manager and manually set the Scene to use ROOT permissions ~
Please grant Scene the "modify system Settings" permission!
Please grant Scene the "modify system Settings" permission, This is recommended
请先授权允许Scene“通知使用权限”！
Busybox from the Scene does not support your current system. Please download and install Busybox by yourself
You cannot use this feature without obtaining ROOT permission
Presets from the Scene. The four modes adapt to different scenes
Presets from the Scene. Contains four more performance-oriented patterns
Detect APP switchover, automatically change the mode
Reboot the system screen without rebooting the system (possibly causing bugs)
Restart to 9008 mode for some Qualcomm models available
Choose the monitor hover window you want to display
Tips：In the [Classic Monitor], Single click Expand or Collapse details, Double click to close it
Displays the CPU, GPU, RAM, and battery status
Displays the CPU, GPU, RAM, and battery status, Use a smaller window
The swappiness follows with the system global configuration
Switch to more swappines to promote swap
Make swappines smaller and swap less
Limit physical memory usage and allow swapping
Only a small amount of physical memory is allowed, and memory swapping is actively allowed
Specifies the direction of the screen when using this application
Maintains the display of application manifest declarations
Automatically rotate the screen direction according to the sensor
Automatically rotate the screen direction according to the sensor
Force this application to display in portrait
When you go to this app, switch to [Efficiency] mode
When you go to this app, switch to the [Balance] mode
When you go to this app, switch to [Performance] mode
When you go to this app, switch to top [Extreme] mode
When you go to this app, Switch to the mode specified by the [Global Default]
Keep the current mode when switching to this application

When the mobile phone enters the standby state and switches to the specified mode, this mode is used by default for applications whose scheduling mode is not set separately.\n\n To set a separate mode for an application, please click [Application Mode] at the bottom of the current interface.
After the phone enters the standby state, switch to the specified mode
If the foreground application changes, wait 5 seconds before switching the scheduling mode

This feature is currently only available for some local Chinese apps. 

若未开启此选项，Scene只会在需要变换档位时执行调度配置文件，例如：在多个设为[省电模式]的应用之间切换，调度配置文件只会被执行一次。

严格模式下，Scene会在每次前台应用发生变化时都执行调度配置文件，并告知被切换到前台运行的应用(包名)。调度配置作者可利用此特性，为不同的应用单独设计调度参数，而不再受限于只有四个档位的限制。

骁龙855、865、888机型使用[经典配置][偏重性能]配置源时，可开启严格模式，在以下应用中体验专属优化:
原神(官服、B服、小米服)
闲鱼、淘宝、京东、天猫、百度贴吧
双生视界
哔哩哔哩、抖音

其它处理器机型，除非正在使用外部配置源头(且配置作者已注明支持此特性)，否则无需开启此选项！
Set a scheduling mode for each application
You cannot enable this feature until a valid scheduling configuration is installed

You are using a scheduling configuration created by another author(Located in /data/powercfg.sh), Switching to the Scene official schedule requires deleting it. Do you want to delete it now? \n\n* After deletion, it is recommended to restart the phone once
You are using a scheduling configuration created by another author(Located in /data/powercfg.sh)
Scene\'s official scheduling configuration has not been adapted to the current SOC~
You did not activate [Automatic shift], Scene can not adjust the device performance according to the foreground application changes!
Uperf does not provide an Extreme mode, so choosing this mode may not have an effect
Open the application to automatically perform operations
When you block notifications, the Scene automatically clears new notifications, which may cause missed messages
Mini performance monitor showing Scene (Amoled please worry about the screen ~)
Please go back to the function menu and enable the [Automatic shift]
This will clear your [performance tuning, manual brightness, screen rotation, memory (Cgroup), auto boost, performance Monitor] options for individual app configurations!
The AccessibilityService configuration has been updated~
The configuration parameters have been updated!
Sorry, your Linux kernel does not support this feature.
During the foreground running of the application, the remaining memory is checked every 10 seconds. If the free memory is lower than 16%, the memory reclamation is actively triggered.
Note: If swap is not enabled, this feature may not have much effect
When the available RAM ratio falls below 16%, memory reclamation is actively triggered
Look here, Is this your preferred language?
